author: Jessy Khattak
comment: This watchface looks great and performs fantastically. Battery usage is light and there are a ton of customization options. However the date doesn't update until I turn it off and then back on in the options menu every day. 3 stars until fixed.
title: Beautiful watch face, broken date display

author: Garrett Kynard
comment: This app is all i ever wanted. I really am surprised that there are not more like it around. I am able to customize everything just right and the digital glitch animations look really cool.
title: Just what i wanted

comment: I have no idea what some of these system UI settings are. Status bar gravity? Protect hotword? Card progress mode? Are these documented someplace?

author: Graeme Spurs Lawnor
comment: Well worth the money, been looking for this for ages... looks amazing in black. Thanks again you nailed it :)
title: Thanks for this

author: Mark Houghton
comment: Love the animation. Any chance of a less manic battery indicator?
title: Awesome

author: Cole Adams
comment: Very awesome and simple with lots of customization!

author: Cyrisus Leaorem
comment: Absolutely awesome! Smooth animations and nice customisability! However I wish you cold change the background colors with a little more precision rather than picking a color and having it tinted a darker color on half the screen. Also a companion app on the phone through the android wear app would make customization far quicker and easier. Also, with as many options as this watch face has saving presets would be nice, but not required.
title: Fantastic watch face!

author: Cameron Speltz
comment: It'd be nice to turn off the am/pm indicator, change the font, and have more options for the date format. But as I said, all around great face

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback Cameron, you should have an update available in a couple of hours which allows you to turn off the am/pm and also allows you to change the size of the date among the new additional options. Allowing to change the font is in the TODO list, probably for the the next update(s).

title: Nice and sleek, could use more options

author: Liam Moseley
comment: This watch face is brilliant and beautiful and the developer is after updating and improving this app. Would recommend.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thanks Liam, I've pushed another version (version 1.0.2) which should fix this critical bug. Please tell us if you are still experimenting this issue with the version 1.0.2 or greater.

title: This is my favourite watch face...

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: Needs an option to change the look from the phone so the watch can stay on the charger. This would make it fast and save battery when playing around with customization.
title: Lots of options

author: Joffrey Abeilard
comment: This watchface is very slick and works well on my Moto360. Also, there is a lot of settings available. Perfect for the price !
title: Fast and very customizable

author: Alexey Akimov
comment: First watchface i bought after WatchMaker - totally worth it =)  Update: Thanks for quick fix, perfect again.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Right Alexey, version 1.1.4 just reinstated the option to disable (default) oversized ambient mode.

title: Perfect

author: Dwight SwoopFiasco Jones
comment: I don't even bother using other watch faces.  The customization option are just awesome.  Well done!
title: Outstanding

author: Gregory Caridi
comment: Edit: Fixed. Best digital watchface out there.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Version 1.1.4 reinstated the option to turn off "this giant mode", and even by default. Long-press the screen and touch the settings icon in the bottom of your screen, then you will be able to access several settings. Thanks Gregory.

title: Great

author: Joe Scanlon
comment: This face is what android wear and smatchwatch's are all about.
title: Wow

comment: Great face!

author: Mark Rutledge
comment: I love this watch face. Simple, stylish and easily customized. Developer responds quickly to questions!
title: Awesome Watch Face!

author: Dinico Win
comment: Bross. You the real MVP. You need to become a top developer for watch faces...your work is amazing, I don't think anyone can honestly top those beautiful "Glitch" Animations.
title: AQ has done it again

author: Kyle Maza
comment: Looks wonderful and pretty nice customization options. My request for a future update is to add battery life percentage.
title: Looks great - LG G Watch R

author: Michael Le
comment: At first I had the time not updating bug, but now all appears well!

author: Steve Giles
comment: Love the design!

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thanks Steve, a second fix has been pushed (version 1.0.2), please tell us if you do not experience this crazy bug anymore.

title: Update made it perfect!

author: Jacob Smith
comment: Great face, great dev. Highly recommend.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Right, I've pushed another update (version 1.0.2), it's another blind fix because I am not able to reproduce this issue but I think I found the cause, "this time".

title: Seems to be working now.

author: CJ Laing
comment: I like it, beautiful and techy watch face, truly deserving of my 5 star rating. :) Saw that settings are available on the watch.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thank you CJ, settings on the phone/tablet are not yet available but will be. Stay tuned.

title: Good

author: James Kitchings
comment: It will be even better once the settings is moved to the wear app itself. :)
title: Pretty great so far!

author: Benoît `BoD` Lubek
comment: I love the simplicity and the options. The ability to rotate the display is a nice touch :)
title: Very nice!

author: Jos van Baal
comment: Best animations i've ever seen on a watchface!
title: Simple, fluid and very clean!

author: Tom Hoots
comment: Gosh, I just want a digital face without weather, heart rate, and on and on and on and on.  So, this is very nice, and I'm happy with it.  There is only one problem:  Please, please, please, please, don't make people go through what I had to do in order to figure out HOW ON EARTH DO YOU GET TO THE SETTINGS, and provide a simple sentence to the effect that you can access the settings via the "choose watch face" control ON THE WATCH.  I was always changing the watch face via the Android Wear app on my phone, and for the life of me I couldn't figure out how to get to the settings.  There is only the most very brief split-second look at it in the video -- I actually had to rewind it and put it on pause to see that it was in the "choose watch face" control.  So, one sentence, could you please add that to your description?  It would save all kinds of time and aggravation!
title: Very nice and minimal.
